settings.Name: bubbleChatEnabled
settings.Description: Suppresses the rise of the chat bubbles

settings.Name: chatAnchoredPosition
settings.Notes: 3 is for the center, 2 is for the left, 1 is for top, 0 is for bottom.

settings.Name: chatHorizontalSize
settings.Description: Shrinks the chat to microscopic proportions

settings.Name: chatMessageDisplayCount
settings.Description: Overwhelms the chat with a flood of messages

settings.Name: chatMessageDestroyDelay
settings.Description: Quickens the demise of messages, in seconds
